arts.ttl: Werder Bremen stun Eintracht Frankfurt in clinical home display
arts.sum: Romano Schmid swung in a corner from the left, and Oliver Burke was on hand at the far post to head home, giving the hosts a 1-0 lead against the run of play. Schmid's ability to link play, create chances, and provide defensive cover was crucial in nullifying Frankfurt's possession-based game.

arts.ttl: Bremen put dent in Frankfurt’s Champions League aspirations
arts.sum: Werder Bremen have won three in their last four after a comprehensive 2-0 success over third-placed Eintracht Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Eintracht Frankfurt's Hugo Larsson transfer stance as Man City, Arsenal and other PL clubs circle
arts.sum: TBR Football can exclusively confirm Eintracht Frankfurt’s stance on Hugo Larsson amid interest from Manchester City, Arsenal, Chelsea and Liverpool. Manchester City, Arsenal, Chelsea and...

arts.ttl: Post-Omar Marmoush Eintracht Frankfurt target big finish to 2024/25
arts.sum: The departure of Marmoush after an incredible 15 goals in 17 appearances was one that no fan of the Eagles would have wanted to come at that time, yet it was one that the squad, Toppmöller's coaching staff and supporters accepted with great grace as they warmly saluted the Egyptian's efforts at Deutsche Bank Park ahead of the 2-0 win over Borussia Dortmund on Matchday 18 . Eintracht Frankfurt have adjusted admirably to the departure of star striker Omar Marmoush to Manchester City in the January transfer window, with stars like Mario Götze and Hugo Ekitiké coming to the fore this spring.

arts.ttl: Could Kevin Trapp miss the rest of the season?
arts.sum: Speculation has arisen that Kevin Trapp could miss the rest of the season after suffering an injury setback in training.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen tender contract extension offer to Oliver Burke
arts.sum: SV Werder Bremen head coach Ole Werner commented Scottish striker Oliver Burke's rise at his Thursday pre-match presser. Germany's preeminent footballing publication reports that the Hanseaten wish to extend with the 27-year-old.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Plenty of potential for goals
arts.sum: Two teams with different European dreams face off at the Weserstadion.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Eintracht Frankfurt - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Eintracht Frankfurt, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt’s Kevin Trapp suffers setback
arts.sum: Kauã Santos (21) is set to start a third successive Bundesliga game in goal for Eintracht Frankfurt after Kevin Trapp (34) suffered an injury setback. Speaking at Thursday’s press conference…
